# Form Builder Project - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
React TypeScript form-builder with drag-and-drop functionality, Material UI, and Tailwind CSS.

## Tech Stack
- React 18 + TypeScript
- Vite
- Material UI (MUI)
- Tailwind CSS
- React DnD (drag and drop)
- Monaco Editor (code editing)

## Project Structure
- src/components/FormBuilder - Main layout
- src/components/FieldPalette - Left panel with draggable fields
- src/components/Canvas - Center panel (drop zone)
- src/components/PropertiesPanel - Right panel (properties editor)
- src/components/PreviewModal - Preview modal
- src/components/fields - Individual field components
- src/types - TypeScript interfaces
- src/context - State management

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript strict mode
- Follow React best practices
- Use Material UI components with Tailwind for custom styling
- Implement proper error handling
- Keep components modular and reusable
